lead_paragraph: Nascar fined Danica Patrick $20,000 and placed her on probation for four races because she walked near the racetrack after a crash during the Auto Club 400, a Sprint Cup Series race, at Auto Club Speedway in Fontana, Calif., on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Patrick and Kyle Busch Placed on Probation
headline.main: Kyle Busch and Danica Patrick Receive Probation

snippet: Nascar fined Danica Patrick $20,000 and placed her on probation for four races because she walked near the racetrack after a crash during the Auto Club 400, a Sprint Cup Series race, at Auto Club Speedway in Fontana, Calif., on Sunday.
abstract: Nascar fines Danica Patrick $20,000 and Kyle Busch $10,000 for separate rules infractions.
